languages.text: "Мастер ван Калокс!" {n}Рубиновые глаза Кассии невольно наполняются слезами.{/n} "Из него... словно вытянули все цвета. Бледные, призрачные тени былых оттенков еще цепляются за его душу. Мы должны вытащить его из этого механизма! Мы... мы обязаны!"

"Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes are tearing up against her will.{/n} "It is as if all the colours have been drained from him. Pale, ghostly shadows of his former hues are still clinging to his soul. We need to get him out of this machine! We must!"
languages.original_text: "Мастер ван Калокс!" {n}Рубиновые глаза Кассии невольно наполняются слезами.{/n} "Из него... словно вытянули все цвета. Бледные, призрачные тени былых оттенков еще цепляются за его душу. Мы должны вытащить его из этого механизма! Мы... мы обязаны!"

traits.locale_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes are filling with tears against her will.{/n} "It is as if all the colours had been drained from him. Pale, ghostly shadows of former hues are still clinging to his soul. We have to get him out of this machine! We must!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes are tearing up against her will.{/n} "It is as if all the colours have been drained from him. Pale, ghostly shadows of his former hues are still clinging to his soul. We need to get him out of this machine! We must!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「マスター・ヴァン・カロックス！」{n}カシアの意志に反して、そのルビー色の瞳から涙が流れている。{/n}「まるで色がすべて抜かれてしまったかのようです。青白くい幽霊のような影が、まだ彼の魂にまとわりついています。彼をこの機械から解放しなければ！急ぎましょう！」
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes are tearing up against her will.{/n} "It is as if all the colours have been drained from him. Pale, ghostly shadows of his former hues are still clinging to his soul. We need to get him out of this machine! We must!"

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ヴァン・カロックス！」{n}カシアの意志に反して、そのルビー色の瞳から涙が流れている。{/n}「まるで色がすべて抜かれてしまったかのようです。青白くい幽霊のような影が、まだ彼の魂にまとわりついています。彼をこの機械から解放しなければ！急ぎましょう！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师！”{n}卡西娅红宝石般的眼睛不由自主地流出了眼泪。{/n}“他的颜色好像全都被吸干了一样。不过，那些黯淡的颜色依然附在他的灵魂上，仿佛幽灵一样。我们必须把他从这台机器里弄出来！必须救他！”
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes are tearing up against her will.{/n} "It is as if all the colours have been drained from him. Pale, ghostly shadows of his former hues are still clinging to his soul. We need to get him out of this machine! We must!"

traits.locale_text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师！”{n}卡西娅红宝石般的眼睛不由自主地流出了眼泪。{/n}“他的颜色好像全都被吸干了一样。不过，那些黯淡的颜色依然附在他的灵魂上，仿佛幽灵一样。我们必须把他从这台机器里弄出来！必须救他！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Maestro van Calox!». {n}Los ojos rubí de Cassia lagrimean contra su voluntad.{/n} «Es como si todos los colores le hubieran sido arrebatados. Sombras pálidas y fantasmales de tonos anteriores aún se aferran a su alma. ¡Debemos sacarle de esta máquina! ¡De inmediato!».
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes are tearing up against her will.{/n} "It is as if all the colours have been drained from him. Pale, ghostly shadows of his former hues are still clinging to his soul. We need to get him out of this machine! We must!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Maestro van Calox!». {n}Los ojos rubí de Cassia lagrimean contra su voluntad.{/n} «Es como si todos los colores le hubieran sido arrebatados. Sombras pálidas y fantasmales de tonos anteriores aún se aferran a su alma. ¡Tenemos que sacarle de esta máquina! ¡De inmediato!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Meister van Calox!" {n}Cassia schießen unwillkürlich Tränen in die rubinroten Augen.{/n} "Es ist, als wäre sämtliche Farbe aus ihm gewichen. Blasse, gespenstische Schatten seiner einstigen Färbungen klammern sich noch an seine Seele. Wir müssen ihn aus dieser Maschine holen! Wir müssen!"
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes are tearing up against her will.{/n} "It is as if all the colours have been drained from him. Pale, ghostly shadows of his former hues are still clinging to his soul. We need to get him out of this machine! We must!"

traits.locale_text: "Meister van Calox!" {n}Cassia schießen unwillkürlich Tränen in die rubinroten Augen.{/n} "Es ist, als wäre sämtliche Farbe aus ihm gewichen. Blasse, gespenstische Schatten ehemaliger Töne klammern sich noch an seine Seele. Wir müssen ihn aus dieser Maschine holen! Wir müssen!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Maître von Calox ! {n}s'épouvante Cassia, ses yeux rubis au bord des larmes.{/n} C'est comme si toutes ses couleurs avaient été aspirées... De ses nuances passées ne restent plus que des ombres pâles qui s'accrochent désespérément à son âme. Nous devons l'extraire de cette machine ! Il le faut ! »
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes are tearing up against her will.{/n} "It is as if all the colours have been drained from him. Pale, ghostly shadows of his former hues are still clinging to his soul. We need to get him out of this machine! We must!"

traits.locale_text: « Maître von Calox ! {n}s'épouvante Cassia, ses yeux rubis au bord des larmes.{/n} C'est comme si toutes ses couleurs avaient été aspirées... De ses nuances passées ne restent plus que des ombres pâles qui s'accrochent désespérément à son âme. Nous devons l'extraire de cette machine ! Il le faut ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Üstat van Calox!" {n}Cassia'nın yakut kırmızısı gözleri, istemsizce doluyor.{/n} "Tüm renkleri akıtılmış sanki. Eski renk tonlarının solgun ve hayaletsi gölgesi, ruhundan bağını henüz koparmamış. Onu bu makineden çıkarmalıyız! Hadi!"
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox!" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes are tearing up against her will.{/n} "It is as if all the colours have been drained from him. Pale, ghostly shadows of his former hues are still clinging to his soul. We need to get him out of this machine! We must!"

traits.locale_text: "Üstat van Calox!" {n}Cassia'nın yakut kırmızısı gözleri istemsizce doluyor.{/n} "Tüm renkleri akıtılmış sanki. Eski renk tonlarının solgun ve hayaletsi gölgesi, ruhundan bağını henüz koparmamış. Onu bu makineden çıkarmalıyız! Başka yolu yok!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
